sentences.en: ...the vivid kaleidoscope of colours displayed in the plumage of the peacock.
A kaleidoscope is an optical toy.
sentences.cn: 万花筒是一种光学玩具.

sentences.en: At sunset the sky became a kaleidoscope of colors.
sentences.cn: 夕阳西下时,天空的颜色千变万化.

sentences.en: He swiftly dismissed the kaleidoscope of memory, oppressed by the urgent need of the present.
sentences.cn: 眼前有急于要办的事逼迫着他,他一下子打消了记忆中的那些千变万化的情景.

sentences.en: His paintings are a kaleidoscope of gorgeous colours.
sentences.cn: 他的油画色彩斑斓,变化万千.

sentences.en: Sun and shadow made the landscape a kaleidoscope of color and pattern.
sentences.cn: 阳光和阴影使风景的颜色和图案千变万化.

sentences.en: That the twisting kaleidoscope, moves us all in turn.
sentences.cn: 生命万花筒, 带我们共轮回.

sentences.en: The bazaar was a kaleidoscope of strange sights and impressions.
sentences.cn: 集市的景象光怪陆离,纷然杂陈.

sentences.en: The China Kaleidoscope Phantom Co. ltd was established in 2002, The headquarters suppose in Shanghai.
sentences.cn: 中国万花筒影像有限公司成立于2002年, 总部设于上海.

sentences.en: The controls for Kaleidoscope are pretty straight forward.
sentences.cn: 万花筒效果的控制是非常直接的.

sentences.en: The food coloring is moved by this and so you can see a kaleidoscope effect.
sentences.cn: 食用色素就是因为这样移动的,所以你才可以看到万花筒的效果.

sentences.en: The search lights and the fireworks made the sky a kaleidoscope of colour.
sentences.cn: 探照灯和焰火使得天空的颜色千变万化.

sentences.en: The street was a kaleidoscope of colors, smells and sounds.
sentences.cn: 这个街市是各种颜色 、 气味和声音的万花筒.

sentences.en: This city is a kaleidoscope of colours, smells, and sounds.
sentences.cn: 这个城市是各种颜色 、 气味和声音的万花筒.

sentences.en: Tom was given a kaleidoscope on his birthday.
sentences.cn: 汤姆在他生日当天得到一支万花筒.

sentences.en: Turning the page here is like twisting a kaleidoscope.
sentences.cn: 翻动此书的每一页就像转动万花筒.

words.tran_cn: 千变万化的；万花筒似的

trans.tran_cn: 万花筒，千变万化，瞬息万变
trans.tran_en: a pattern, situation, or scene that is always changing and has many details or bright colours
